This is my successor to my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79641/?]Bounty Quest Giver Voth[/url] you can also use it along with this mod.
They give random Bounty Quest base on their area of origins
Their quest is base on bounty quest of stewards so sometimes they offer quest sometimes they don't.
You can also make them followers so they can help you on their bounty quests.
After you do their quest you can claim the reward to them.
They start their level base on your character's level

[color=#00ff00]There are 2 versions[/color]
1. with perks
2. no perks

[size=4][b]If you want to test if they really gives bounty quest
just reload your save game until they gives a quest.[/b][/size]

I create this mod because I want simple followers who will give me bounty quests.
My plan is I would only use this for my personal use but maybe other's would like it so I upload it.

Follower Infos:

Vin = Dual Sword Wielder, The [i]Frozen Hearth[/i] Winterhold

Gjavkin = Two handed, The [i]Winking Skeever[/i] Solitude

Maeiguon = Archer Dual Sword Wielder, [i]Dead Man's Drink[/i] Falkreath

Bill = Sword and Shield, The [i]Bee and Barb[/i] Riften
